document_data.name: Dusty Gnome Tavern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dusty Gnome Tavern''' was an inn and a tavern located in the town of [[Leilon]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
document_data.Location: The tavern stood just off the town's sleepy central square.
document_data.Atmosphere: The Dusty Gnome catered to local miners who boisterously partook in [[ale]]-fueled revelries after their long hard shifts. Any visitor was greeted with laughter, loud voices, and clanking of ale flagons.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the establishment was ran by a middle-aged male [[human]] innkeeper who offered libations and cheap guest accommodations.
